## Description

Set giotto polygon spatVector


## Usage

```r
set_polygon_info(gobject, polygon_name = "cell", gpolygon, verbose = TRUE)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`gobject`     |     giotto object
`polygon_name`     |     name of polygons. Default "cell"
`gpolygon`     |     giotto polygon
`verbose`     |     verbosity


## Value

giotto object
